name: The Late Night Zombie Roast
description:
They Have Trapped You!

Forced into a secluded warehouse with no way out! You must use the tools available to fight the infinite hordes of the undead and last long enough to escape. The only weapons you have are a powerful flamethrower and an armful of Molotov cocktails. Watch out for your ammo supply, and keep an eye out for refuels around the warehouse. Remember to... Watch. Your. BACK!

Controls

W,A,S,D, to move

Move the mouse to look around

Left-click to shoot the flamethrower

Right-click to throw a Molotov cocktail (best used while standing still)

Walk through glowing ammo to pick up

(Currently only available on PC using the Keyboard - Not gamepad compatible)

Install

Download the zip folder and extract all of the files. Then run TheLateNightZombie.exe

Created by Drew MacPherson, a student of SAE Institute London.
